love_hopeful.poem:
Love blooms in quiet corners,
Where doubt once lived.
The sunlight doesn’t ask,
It simply warms.
Even broken things can grow,
Hope lives in the reaching.

The sunlight doesn’t ask,
It simply warms.
Even broken things can grow,
Hope lives in the reaching.
